survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Dairy Alternatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, purchasing behaviors, and satisfaction levels regarding plant-based dairy alternatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, oat milk, soy yogurt)?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based dairy alternatives (e.g., almond milk, oat milk, soy yogurt)?

questions.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specifics.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which types of plant-based dairy alternatives do you typically purchase? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type. Ensure mobile-friendly drag-and-drop or numerical input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: ranking (SINGLE_CHOICE for each rank).

script.question_text: What factors most influence your decision to purchase plant-based dairy alternatives? (Rank in order of importance, 1 being most important)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in plant-based dairy alternatives?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of plant-based dairy alternatives in your local grocery stores?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Single-choice radio button.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of plant-based dairy alternatives in your local grocery stores?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Several times a week', or 'Once a week' in Q1.
